item.description:
Sorry for the late notice, but I had planned to go to Fred's meetup to see Troll Hunters.  S ince that movie isn't coming to Boston after all, I thought let's see what else is out there.    This looks like it could be fun.   I hope some of you are available to come out and play with me.  

Movie time is 6:15, I will be at the theater by 5:15 and we will go in for seats around 5:45.  Note, this is the non-imax version...thought we could save a few bucks and see it as a normal movie.  ;>  Be aware it is opening weekend and they have been hyping this a bit, so an advance ticket might be a good idea.

As usual, if you miss the group before the movie, look for us after.  We will gather in the hallway outside the room where the movie was playing to discuss the movie, allow for restroom breaks and get a head count of those who are interested in going out after for something to eat/drink and of course more talk about movies.  

Movie Details:

Release Date: June 10, 2011 (conventional and IMAX theaters)
Studio: Paramount Pictures
Director: J.J. Abrams
Screenwriter: J.J. Abrams
Starring: Kyle Chandler, Elle Fanning, Joel Courtney, Gabriel Basso, Noah Emmerich, Ron Eldard, Riley Griffiths, Ryan Lee, Zach Mills
Genre: Action, Horror, Thriller
MPAA Rating: Not Available
Official Website: Super8-movie.com 

Plot Summary: In the summer of 1979, a group of friends in a small Ohio town witness a catastrophic train crash while making a super 8 movie and soon suspect that it was not an accident. Shortly after, unusual disappearances and inexplicable events begin to take place in town, and the local Deputy tries to uncover the truth – something more terrifying than any of them could have imagined.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin. The moving is showing upstairs, so I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalators.
item.name: Super 8
